comment: Sarah is very sweet, but I also feel like she rubbed me the wrong way. KSU1101 is a very unnecessary class, and instead of just accepting that professor Matta loads you up with unnecessary busy work. Class is a waste of time, and definitely needs to be redesigned. Also she's an VERY tough grader
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: Sarah is a new teacher. She is very nice and understanding. The assignments are very easy, but you just have to keep up with them & deadlines. The tests are all open notes. Be sure to right done many things that she says during the powerpoints because she will ask some questions based from what she says. And pay attention to guest speakers. Easy A!
